posts.post_content:
Giving the BST/WTB a shot for the first time. I realize half the board wants to buy this card. But here's my pitch. I'm a collector (not a dealer) looking to complete a centered Cobb run in the PSA 4-5 range. Will offer at least 1.5x SMR price for a beautifully centered example. 

Thank you for looking.
Sam 
[url]samuelswartz@yahoo.com[/url]
